akas from release info: Hyakuren no Haou to Seiyaku no Valkyria (original title)

1.title: The Oath of the Chalice

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: Yuuto are leading the Wolf clan into victory against the Horn clan and capture their patriarch.

2.title: Tactics of the Wolf

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: Yuuto allied with the Horn clan. but now he must defend them from a new enemy from the west, the Hoof clan .

3.title: Twin Runes and Twin Sisters

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

3.plot: Celebrating the defeat of the Hoof clan. the Horn clan holds a Victory banquet for Yuuto, but an uninvited guest decide to appear, the leader of the lightning clan.

4.title: Steel is Tempered One Hundred Times

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

4.plot: A new town is now under the control of the Wolf clan, and they are not willing to accept Yuuto changes. on top of that the Lightning clan plan to attack and Yuuto must think of a new strategy to stop them.

5.title: The Lion That Devours the Tiger

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

5.plot: The powerful Lightning clan is attacking and Yuuto must prevail their attack using any means necessary.

6.title: Valkyrie's Day Off

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

6.plot: After a series of battles Yuuto's party decides he should take a small vacation and takes him to a hot spring.

7.title: A Long-Awaited Revenge

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

7.plot: Yet another powerful foe is after the Wolf. This time, it's the former brother of Yuuto, who was exiled for his misdeeds. Now he wants revenge.

8.title: The Kotatsu and the Empty Bellows

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

8.plot: Yuuto cozies up with Felicia and the others underneath his new kotatsu. Later, things heat up between Yuuto and Ingrid.

9.title: Beautiful Moon

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

9.plot: In the 21st Century, Mitsuki's friend, Ruri, takes her to her cousin, Saya, hoping that her knowledge of mythology might help them find out more on where Yuuto is.

10.title: Cornered Wolf

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

11.title: Proof of a Great Ruler

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

11.plot: Out of ideas, Yuuto decides to face the Panther Clan head-on and inspires his men with a rousing speech, but is it all in vain?

12.title: A Place to Call Home

episode of.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar (TV Series 2018)

imdb.plot outline: Suou Yuuto was an ordinary kid until while on a class trip transport into another world called Yggdrasil. There by the hand of fate and his smartphone he became the wolf clan leader. now he must wage war against neighboring clans by using the power of the internet to build a winning strategy and simultaneously search for a way back home.
imdb.title: The Master of Ragnarok and Blesser of Einherjar
plot: Suou Yuuto was transported into another world called Yggdrasil. after one year he became the wolf clan leader. now he must wage war against neighboring clans and simultaneously search for a way Back home.

Suou Yuuto was an ordinary kid until while on a class trip transport into another world called Yggdrasil. There by the hand of fate and his smartphone he became the wolf clan leader. now he must wage war against neighboring clans by using the power of the internet to build a winning strategy and simultaneously search for a way back home.
